Package gov.usgs.earthquake.indexer

  • java.lang.Object

    ProductIndex, Configurable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    ExtentIndex
    public class JDBCProductIndex
extends JDBCConnection
implements ProductIndex

      • JDBC_DEFAULT_FILE

        public static final java.lang.String JDBC_DEFAULT_FILE
        Default index file. Created by copying JDBC_DEFAULT_INDEX out of Jar if doesn't already exist in file system

      • addAssociation

        public Event addAssociation​(Event event,
                            ProductSummary summary)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Create an association between the given event and product summary. This assumes that both the event and the product are already stored in their respective tables.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        event -
        summary -
        Returns:
        Copy of event with summary added to the event's products list

        java.lang.Exception

      • removeAssociation

        public Event removeAssociation​(Event event,
                               ProductSummary summary)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Delete the association, if it exists, between the given event and product summary. NOTE: this removes the association between the event and ALL versions of the product summary.
        Specified by:
        removeAssociation in interface ProductIndex
        Parameters:
        event -
        summary -
        Returns:
        Copy of event with summary removed from the products list
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • buildProductClauses

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.String> buildProductClauses​(ProductIndexQuery query)
        Build a list of all the pieces of the WHERE clause relevant to the productSummary table. If the query doesn't set any properties, this method will return an empty list. It is up to the calling methods to check if the clause list is empty when they build their WHERE clause.
        Parameters:
        query -
        Returns:
        list containing clauses in the form: column="value"

      • buildProductQuery

        protected java.lang.String buildProductQuery​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> clauseList,
                                             java.lang.String orderby)
        Create the full SELECT query for the products table using the clauseList as the WHERE clause
        Parameters:
        clauseList - List of Strings to be AND'd together in the WHERE clause
        orderby - Complete ORDER BY clause to be added after the WHERE clause
        Returns:
        String containing the full SELECT query

      • buildProductQuery

        protected java.lang.String buildProductQuery​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> clauseList)
        Create the full SELECT query for the products table using the clauseList as the WHERE clause. This method is a wrapper for buildProductQuery(List, String) with an empty orderby string
        Parameters:
        clauseList -
        Returns:
        String containing the full SELECT query

      • normalizeLongitude

        protected double normalizeLongitude​(double lon)
        Convert the given longitude to be between -180 and 180. If the given value is already in the range, this method just returns the value.
        Parameters:
        lon -
        Returns:
        double normalized between -180 and 180
